1.text: Paint watercolor paper or use cardstock or construction paper.

3.text: Fold them in half and cut the open edge into a petal shape.

5.text: Put hot glue in the corners, wrapping the first one very tightly.

6.text: Glue the petals to each other in an open fashion, layering them.

7.text: Cut your paper into a square.

8.text: Draw a spiral on the paper.

9.text: Cut it out and roll it around the tip of a pencil or Q-tip.

10.text: Unroll and secure the bottom with a dab of hot glue if desired.

11.text: Choose a variety of different colored pieces of tissue paper.

12.text: Cut strips from the tissue paper.

13.text: Cut vertical lines into the strip, leaving an inch or so untouched.

14.text: Take a small piece of floral wire and bend it at the top.

15.text: Take your cut up strip and wrap it around the stem.

16.text: After you have made your flower, take the floral tape and wrap it over the masking tape.
